entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023
